partFamilies.description: Primary weapon emission and barrel hardware.
Charge storage for burst output and volley sustain.
Cooling loops and dissipators for sustained fire.
Control stack and tactical behavior firmware.
Field coils for shield and sensor energy shaping.
Regulation modules for stable throughput and control.
Thermal sinks tuned for defensive and utility modules.
Central processing and power core internals.

manufacturers.flavor: High DPS, high heat, long reach, lower reliability.
Lower damage ceiling, low heat, shorter range, highly reliable.
Stealth-burst doctrine: high alpha and ambush utility with slower cycle pacing.
Control and utility specialist with superior tracking and lock control.
